headline: Three Reasons Investors Love ServiceNow (NOW)
summary: What a fantastic six months it’s been for ServiceNow. Shares of the company have skyrocketed 44.9%, hitting $1,055. This was partly due to its solid quarterly results, and the run-up might have investors contemplating their next move.

headline: ServiceNow price target raised to $1,150 from $1,075 at Needham
summary: Needham raised the firm’s price target on ServiceNow (NOW) to $1,150 from $1,075 and keeps a Buy rating on the shares after hosting the company for a group investor meeting last week.
